text:
What is best practice for canonicalisation of HubSpot Blog Listing pages? Our SEO software is flagging duplicate pages titles for the blog/page/1 & blog/page/2 etc, but HubSpot says this “For blog listing pages, select a canonical URL setting. *If you select Set each blog listing page’s canonical URL to the first page in its series, search engines may be unable to find subsequent pages for your blog listing page.*” - I’m wondering if need to add something into our template to support canonicalisation?

Any advice appreciated!

I'm very very new for HubSpot. Actually, In Create Company form I have a single select drop down and here when I choose *Add New one* option from the drop down I want to add one more new textbox bottom of the select box field. I'm not sure how to do this? Could you please help me?
Not looking for a long explanation just wondering if apps built on <http://bubble.io|bubble.io> can easily be integrated with HubSpot API's

I'm getting these errors, but there are values there (by default). Shouldn't it be using the default values by default in a number (slider) field that's required? I have them as required and with default values, so I would assume I don't even need a check and can do this directly `<div class="columns-module-wrapper" style="margin: {{ module.section_spacing.vertical }}rem {{ module.section_spacing.horizontal }}rem;">`

anyone notice that if they are pulling dates from HubDB, it is showing the date before not the date that is actually in the table? we have noticed this on several of our portals not sure if something with HubDB changed or HubL code
screenshots? example? it’d be nice to see the hubdb row’s id and date value in a screenshot and the values printed out via `{{ row|pprint }}`

Quick question that I think I know the answer to but want to confirm...

Is the default HubSpot Blog Subscribe form "smart"?

Meaning, if I have a single blog listing page template that includes the blog subscribe module and I'm using that template for multiple blogs.  Will someone that subscribes to "BLOG #2" get notifications to only that blog and not any others using the same template?
Hey all, is there any instagram feed module for HubSpot? i need to integrate a section that the client can show posts from instagram. any thoughts?

Hi All,
I have a question regarding Workflow Extension external data fetch. When I make a POST request to my dataUrl using Postman I get the result as expected. However in HubSpot Workflow actions no data is shown. My server gets the POST request from HubSpot but nothing is showing up in HubSpot as shown below. Can anybody suggest what could be the issue here?
